titleStmt.title: Warm beere, or, A treatise wherein is declared by many reasons that beere so qualified is farre more wholsome then that which is drunke cold with a confutation of such objections that are made against it, published for the preservation of health.
titleStmt.author: F. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.D. for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
